mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (user_name, account, `password`, `status`, creat_time, faculty, sex, modify_time) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{faculty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, faculty = #{faculty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, account, `password`, `status`, creat_time, faculty, sex, modify_time from user
